org.team5940.robot_core.modules.sensors.binary_input

Class TogglingBinaryInputModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.AbstractModule
      • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.sensors.binary_input.TogglingBinaryInputModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module, BinaryInputModule, TestableModule

    public class TogglingBinaryInputModule
extends AbstractModule
implements BinaryInputModule
    An implementation of BinaryInputModule that changes its state after some kind of change in another BinaryInputModule.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TogglingBinaryInputModule

        public TogglingBinaryInputModule(java.lang.String name,
                                 LoggerModule logger,
                                 BinaryInputModule input,
                                 boolean initialState,
                                 boolean triggerType,
                                 double sampleRate)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes a new TogglingBinaryInputModule.
        Parameters:
        name - This' name.
        logger - This' logger.
        input - The input from which to determine this' state.
        initialState - The initial state this should be in.
        triggerType - The type of trigger on which to toggle this' state. True for rising edge or false for falling.
        sampleRate - How often (in Hz) to check for changes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if any argument is null or the sample rate is less than or equal to 0.
